cab.content: This document is the property of His Britannio Majesty's Government.CONFIDENTIAL4G.T. 8341WAR CABII3T,NOTE BY THTfl SBOEJSTARY.In view of the early meeting of Parliament, I am authorised by Mr.Bonar Law to state that it is hoped to take the following subjects at a meeting of, the War Cabinet very early next week, if possible on Monday,, namely :-'IMPORTS AIi-ID EXPOSTS REGULATION BILL - G.T.,8329,COMBINES BILLG.T.' B3E8.WATER POWER BILL - G.T. 8330,It is. suggested that these Bills should be examined at once(signed) M.P,A.Hankey,Secretary, War Cabinet *Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1. 17th October,. 1919.
